sentences.en: Its forged and hammered metal had been wrought into elegant , almost arabesque, curves.
sentences.cn: 经过千锤百炼,金属打造成了漂亮的, 有藤蔓纹饰和曲线的牛铃.

sentences.en: Its predominant vein was, in Poe's own phrase, " the grotesque and arabesque. "
sentences.cn: 它的最主要的特点, 用坡自己的话说, 就是 “ 怪诞和奇异. ”

sentences.en: Not much has changed since the 1920s, and walking into the lobby, with ornate Ottoman furniture and arabesque tiles, is like stepping into an Agatha Christie novel.
sentences.cn: 自1920年代以来没有发生多大改变，步入陈设有华丽的奥斯曼风格家具和阿拉伯式花纹瓷砖的大堂，就像进入了阿加莎·克里斯蒂（侦探小说家）的小说之中。

sentences.en: The ballerina remained suspended in a faultless arabesque.
sentences.cn: 这位芭蕾舞女演员一直保持着完美的阿拉贝斯克舞姿不动。

trans.tran_cn: 阿拉伯式花饰，错综图饰，阿拉伯图案，阿拉贝斯克芭蕾舞姿（独脚站立，手前伸，另一脚一手向后伸）
trans.tran_en: a decorative pattern of flowing lines
